index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Permit Fee Ordinance, as adopted by Ordinance 114243, as amended by Ordinances 114810, 115253 and 115426, is amended by: amending Section 22.900.010, Title; Section 22.900.020, Purpose; Section 22.900.030, Administration and Enforcement; Section 22.900.040, General Provisions - Transition; Section 22.900.050, General Provisions - Portion of Fees To Be Collected At Time of Application; Section 22.900.070, General Provisions - Revisions and Additions; Section 22.900.110, Reestablishment; Section 22.900.120, Property Address Change; Section 22.900.140, Refund of Fees; Section 22.900.150, Housing Fees; Section 22.900.170 Building Permit Fees; Section 22.900.200, Certificate of Approval Fees; Section 22.900.205, Special Valuation Program for Historic Properties; Section 22.900.210, Elevator Permit Fees; Section 22.900.220, Permit Fees for Mechanical, Boiler and Refrigeration Equipment and Systems; Section 22.900.230, Electrical Permit Fees; Section 22.900.240, Land Use/Zoning Fees; and Section 22.900.280 Fees Imposed; by adding a new Section 22.900.254, Building Grade Sheets; and repealing Section 22.900.160, Product Review Fees.
